name: Spook: The Bad Luck Cat
description:
Spook: The Bad Luck Cat is an adventure game created by Clare Brown, Grace Thompson, and Natasha Yasi for the Oregon State University Computer Science Capstone project. This is our first attempt at making a computer game.

This game was created for educational purposes only.

Game Controls:

Click on the screen to move the player.

Use ASWD keys to rotate the camera.

Spook begins in a dark room, and must find a light source in order to explore the space. Once lit, Spook can choose to interact with a ball or a toy mouse, which will set Spook on a path to either search for food, or search for a companion cat named Ally.
